column4: hey guys why don't my text look as clear as what it does on windows, like when i make it smaller under firefox?
maybe its cause I need to put a clearer font on
how can i get the msfonts
is that what you try to do?
it's best to only install packages from the ubuntu repos
really, you should install it through synaptic. So use the pages ubotu sent you
if you install phpmyadmin through synaptic it works great
installing manually is a lot of work and probably it wont work after all
it's in the multiverse repo so
again, look at what ubotu says
yes. you have to enable the multiverse repo. And how to do that is in the reply from ubotu
